water.name: Water
water.description: The most common ingredient in skincare products. It serves as a solvent for other ingredients and helps hydrate the skin.

glycerin.name: Glycerin
glycerin.description: A humectant that draws moisture to the skin, providing hydration and improving skin barrier function.

sodium lauryl sulfate.name: Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
sodium lauryl sulfate.description: A cleansing agent and surfactant found in many personal care products. It creates the foaming action in shampoos and cleansers.
concerns: Can be drying to skin and hair

fragrance.name: Fragrance
fragrance.description: A blend of chemicals that gives products a distinctive scent. Companies aren't required to disclose specific ingredients in fragrances.
concerns: Can cause skin irritation and sensitization
May trigger respiratory issues in some individuals

parabens.name: Parabens
parabens.description: Preservatives used in cosmetics and personal care products to prevent bacterial growth. Common types include methylparaben, propylparaben, and butylparaben.
concerns: Linked to breast cancer in some studies

retinol.name: Retinol
retinol.description: A vitamin A derivative used in anti-aging products. It promotes cell turnover and collagen production.

vitamin e.name: Vitamin E (Tocopherol)
vitamin e.description: An antioxidant that protects the skin from free radicals and environmental damage. Also serves as a natural preservative.

niacinamide.name: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
niacinamide.description: A form of vitamin B3 that helps improve skin texture, reduce pore appearance, and strengthen the skin barrier.

hyaluronic acid.name: Hyaluronic Acid
hyaluronic acid.description: A powerful humectant that can hold up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing deep hydration to the skin.

formaldehyde.name: Formaldehyde
formaldehyde.description: A preservative used in some cosmetics and personal care products, often released by other preservatives like DMDM hydantoin.

phthalates.name: Phthalates
phthalates.description: A group of chemicals used to increase flexibility and soften plastics. Often found in fragranced products.
concerns: Possible links to asthma and allergies

triclosan.name: Triclosan
triclosan.description: An antibacterial and antifungal agent used in some personal care products to reduce bacterial contamination.

oxybenzone.name: Oxybenzone
oxybenzone.description: A chemical sunscreen ingredient that absorbs UV radiation to protect the skin from sun damage.
concerns: Harmful to coral reefs and marine ecosystems

petrolatum.name: Petrolatum (Petroleum Jelly)
petrolatum.description: A semi-solid mixture of hydrocarbons used as a barrier to lock in moisture.
concerns: May be contaminated with harmful impurities if not properly refined
Can clog pores in some individuals

salicylic acid.name: Salicylic Acid
salicylic acid.description: A beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that helps exfoliate the skin and clear pores. Commonly used in acne treatments.

hydroquinone.name: Hydroquinone
hydroquinone.description: A skin-lightening agent used to reduce hyperpigmentation, age spots, and other forms of discoloration.
concerns: Banned or restricted in many countries
Can cause severe skin irritation and sensitivity

titanium dioxide.name: Titanium Dioxide
titanium dioxide.description: A mineral sunscreen ingredient that reflects and scatters UV radiation to protect skin from sun damage.

zinc oxide.name: Zinc Oxide
zinc oxide.description: A mineral that protects skin from both UVA and UVB rays by reflecting and scattering sunlight.

talc.name: Talc
talc.description: A mineral used in powders and makeup products to absorb moisture and provide a smooth feel.
concerns: May be contaminated with asbestos if not properly purified
Inhalation risk when used in loose powders

phenoxyethanol.name: Phenoxyethanol
phenoxyethanol.description: A preservative used to prevent bacterial growth in cosmetic products and skincare formulations.
concerns: May cause irritation in high concentrations

alcohol denat.name: Alcohol Denat. (Denatured Alcohol)
alcohol denat.description: A type of alcohol used as a solvent and to improve product absorption. It can also provide a cooling sensation.
concerns: May disrupt skin barrier with frequent use
Not recommended for sensitive or dry skin

aloe vera.name: Aloe Vera
aloe vera.description: A natural plant extract with soothing, healing, and moisturizing properties. Often used for sunburns and irritated skin.
